name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Memory Vault - Infinite Long-term memory for ChatGPT and Claude

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make ChatGPT and Claude AI chatbots remember all your past conversations in every new chat.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ðŸ§  Memory Vault - Infinite Long-term memory for ChatGPT and Claude

Memory Vault seamlessly enhances your AI chat experiences with ChatGPT and Claude by maintaining context and providing relevant past conversations exactly when you need them.

Key Features:
â€¢ Automatically captures and organizes important information from your AI conversations
â€¢ Intelligently retrieves relevant past memories based on your current conversation
â€¢ Works seamlessly with both ChatGPT and Claude
â€¢ Smart memory filtering to avoid duplicate information
â€¢ Customizable "Infinite Memory" mode for continuous context
â€¢ Privacy-focused: all data stored locally in your browser

Perfect for:
âœ“ Developers maintaining context across coding sessions
âœ“ Researchers tracking complex topics
âœ“ Students managing study materials
âœ“ Professionals maintaining project continuity
âœ“ Anyone who wants their AI assistant to remember past interactions

How it works:
1. Install the extension
2. Add your FREE Google API key (one-time setup)
3. Start chatting with ChatGPT or Claude
4. Let Memory Vault automatically maintain context or manually retrieve relevant memories

Memory Vault ensures your AI conversations are more coherent, contextual, and productive by maintaining a persistent memory of important details and insights from your past interactions.

Privacy Note: All memories are stored locally in your browser. Your data never leaves your device except when processing with your personal API key.
